did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Social Science Data Center Records

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains a small and random gathering of materials associated with the Social Science Data Center and its publication, The Connecticut Poll.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Established on the Storrs Campus in the 1970s, the Center was affiliated with the political science department. Its programs briefly included the Roper Center and was reengineered as the Center for Survey and Research Analysis which was moved to the Greater Hartford campus of the University circa 2005 and closed in 2009.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. Additional information may be found in the Roper Center Records. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Social Science Data Center Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a small and random gathering of materials associated with the Social Science Data Center and its publication, The Connecticut Poll.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Administrative records, publication (newsletter)[Subjects include: Social science department University of Connecticut, The Connecticut Poll.]
